nodes.text: Grea, also known as Grea the Orfite, was a female Orfite bounty hunter who operated in the Elrood sector. She used her highly developed sense of smell to track people. She owned a custom built starship, the Neverquit.

Grea was born on Kidron, the Orfite homeworld. She left her home planet as soon as she could. She later won a small ship from a gambler and picked up her military skills while ferrying a group of mercenaries around the Methall'has sector.
